title: Master of Science in Computer Science
subtitle: University of Colorado at Boulder, United States
description: Coursework: Network Systems, Datacenter Scale Computing, Computer Security and Ethical Hacking, Designing for Defense, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Object Oriented Analysis and Design.

title: Integrated Master of Science in Software Systems

description: Coursework: Data Structures, Data Communication Networks, Operating Systems, Database Management Systems, Machine Learning, Web Services, Internet of Things, Discrete Structures, Object Oriented Programming.
